mapper.select: select mno from WM_Member where AUTHORITY=1 or AUTHORITY=2
mapper.insert: insert into WM_MSG (sd_mno , rc_mno , msg_content) values (1,#{mno} ,#{msg_content})
mapper.select: select * from WM_MEMBER WHERE AUTHORITY = 0 order by mno desc
select * from WM_MEMBER WHERE USERID LIKE #{userid} order by mno desc
